Quick Start

Generate your micro-services' infrastructure that uses the best proven technologies !

Scalable, Replicable and Highly available

Focus on what matters. We take care of the infrastructure ;)

Mitosis is an open source project.

   Test our alpha right now

All it takes ? One Mitosis command line

1 - Install Mitosis and Yeoman via npm
2 - Generate your Micro-services' Infrastructure

Example of generated Architecture

  • Docker Swarm
  • Kubernates
  • Traefik
  • Jenkins
  • Elasticsearch
  • Kibana
  • Logstash
  • Aritfactory
  • Sonarqube

  • Spring
  • Gradle
